rows.label: qev060501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Welcome! Garbage got you down?
Haunted by hazmats?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Well then, worry no more, my trashy friend!
Our humble waste-processing units have you covered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0003
rows.name: I'm the director here. Name's Liza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0083
rows.name:
Sooooo, need anything disposed of? Whatever you got,
our ultra-high-temp furnace will make it go away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev060501_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Liza that you do have some clutter to clear.

rows.label: qev060501_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev060501_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you are all set for now.

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Yeah? I kind of figured, honestly. Most BLADEs don't
generally spend a lot of time sitting around at home
cleaning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ooo, an organized [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ]. Place for everything and so on
and so forth. I like it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0006
rows.name:
Most BLADE quarters are practically bursting with junk
they brought in from the field. They're pretty much
Mira's super hoarders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0007
rows.name:
As soon as we got this place working, they were lining
up at the door with all kinds of unspeakable garbage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Honestly I don't know where you guys even FIND some
of this stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0009
rows.name:
But we're way understaffed, so if I don't hire somebody
soon, we'll never catch up! Human, alien, whoeverâ€”
I don't care so long as they're good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ooo, wait! Actually, you seem like an expert!
I bet you know just about all there is to know about
the different newfound races, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0011
rows.name:
So then! Know of any that would be an especially
good fit for a career in waste management? Pleeeease?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest Ma-non

rows.label: qev060501_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Liza that a Ma-non would do well.

rows.label: qev060501_JNK0040
rows.name: Suggest Nopon[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Liza that a Nopon would be a natural.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_JNK0050
rows.name: Suggest Zaruboggan

rows.label: qev060501_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Liza that the Zaruboggan were born for this.

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Aw, the cute little guys? Yeah, they certainly seem like
whizzes with machines and stuff. It might work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0013
rows.name:
Those fat fluffballs? You think they could handle this
kind of manual labor? Hmm... Well, maybe they have
some kind of superpower I don't know about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0014
rows.name:
Wait, the creepy mask guys? They're like a mystery
wrapped in a thing I totally don't know anything about.
You sure they're...you know? Trustworthy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0015
rows.name:
Sounds like something to look into extensively during
my copious amounts of free weekend time.
...HA! Kidding. Forget that noise. I'll just trust you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0016
rows.name:
All right! I'll go pay 'em a visit and see if I can't scout
somebody for the plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Earth-alien director! I have news!
So much garbage came that I lost track of duties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0018
rows.name: Then waste unit became angry. Started spitting smoke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0019
rows.name: It looks bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0020
rows.name:
What in the... WAAAAAUGH! It's overheating!
When... How did... Why did you let it get this bad
before doing something?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0021
rows.name:
I did lots of things. I hit machine many times.
Then I shoved jammed trash very hard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Oh, for the love of... Uuuuuurgh...
This hiring is an HR disaster. I blame myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0023
rows.name:
Okay, I'll go scramble to find an emergency hire.
Meanwhile, you get to help out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0024
rows.name:
I need you to use FrontierNav and get me three hunks
of everfreeze ore for coolant, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0085
rows.name:
Oh, and if you run into trouble finding any,
10 bits of jagitos copper should also work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0025
rows.name:
You'll do it, right? Because honestly, a huge flood of
pollutants is going to spill into the city if you don't.
Sooo...yeah. Preeeetty much have to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0026
rows.name: Oh, and the sooner the better, obviously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0027
rows.name:
Ugh, and we're so close to the diner, too.
If that gets contaminated, I'm going to get chewed out
six ways from Sunday...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0059
rows.name:
This is a mega crisis. Probably like the second worst in
my life. Maybe third, if I count that...one thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0060
rows.name:
Ah, perfect! Did you get the everfreeze ore? Or if not,
the jagitos copper? They won't fix the problem,
but they WILL make it a whooole lot better...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0061
rows.name:
WHOA that's cold! Okay, good. This should bring
down the temperature on the busted unit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0062
rows.name:
Thanks a million. I just wish things on my end were
going anywhere near as smoothly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0063
rows.name:
I managed to find some prospective employees,
but when I brought them in, they said the place was a
death trap and took off running.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0064
rows.name:
And I mean, fair point. But it's going to take people to
clean up all the dangerous gunk leaking everywhere,
you know? I'm really at a loss here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_JNK0080
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev060501_SEL0081
rows.name: Try to rally Liza's spirits.

rows.label: qev060501_JNK0090
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev060501_SEL0091
rows.name: Light a fire under Liza with a stern talking-to.

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0065
rows.name:
Yes, that! Say more nice things! I need that!
Oh, yeah, keep it coming... Mmmmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0066
rows.name:
Nooo! If you yell at me, I'm liable to just give up and
walk away from the whole thing! I'm so very fragile...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0067
rows.name:
Do you want to contaminate all of New LA, Liza?
Wouldn't it be better if that...didn't happen?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0068
rows.name:
And why did you ask a muscle-bound Prone to operate
such delicate machinery? Remember how I told you to
find someone technically minded?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0069
rows.name:
Eeek! Tech Advisor Dazbeno! Please don't heap all
that on me right now, sir. I'm already plummeting into
a shame spiral here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0070
rows.name:
*fsssssssssh* Ahhhhhh... I followed the sweet smell of
voltant here, and what a sight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0071
rows.name:
Trachlo Lythren, I really want to devoltanize. *fsssh*
Soon. Like, right now. May I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0072
rows.name:
Sorry, I can't...stop myself!
Aah...aaaaAAAAAAAH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0073
rows.name:
Okay, who are the weirdos and what are they doing?!
...Aside from terrifying me, I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0074
rows.name:
Wait, WHAAAT?! Slap me in the face right now!
Why are the contamination numbers suddenly at zero?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0075
rows.name: *fssssssh* Ahh... So satisfying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0076
rows.name:
I have no idea why voltant was welling up here,
but I will consider it the bounty of Golbogga. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0077
rows.name:
Without a doubt we must give thanks to Golbogga!
*fsssh* Well? Shall we be going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0078
rows.name: What the dickens? Did those guys just do all that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_JNK0100
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev060501_SEL0101
rows.name: Nod and say you're certain of it.

rows.label: qev060501_JNK0110
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev060501_SEL0111
rows.name: Shake your head and say you don't think so.

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0079
rows.name:
Then... Oh geez! I've got to hire them RIGHT NOW!
Whatever weird magic that was, it's super convenient![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0080
rows.name:
At the very least, I'm going to go talk to them and see
what's what.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0081
rows.name:
With any luck, they'll be the saviors of my beloved
waste-processing units![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'll try to find an emergency hire to help out while
you're looking for that everfreeze ore or jagitos copper.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0036
rows.name:
You suggested the Ma-non, right? Cool, cool.
Those guys should be able to do something about this
unholy mess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0037
rows.name:
I'll try to find an emergency hire to help out while
you're looking for that everfreeze ore or jagitos copper.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060501_MSG0038
rows.name:
You suggested the Nopon, right? I guess I'll just have
to bank on them hiding some amazing potential.[ST:wait ]
